caption.p: Scanning electron micrograph of the parasitic flies M. scalaris from Chongqing (female: ( A– E), male: ( F– J)). Female: ( A) mouthpart, ( B) segmental venter of female, ( C) compound eyes, ( D) tibia, and ( E) female terminalia. Male: ( F) spiracle, ( G) left face of male, ( H) wing, ( I) haltere, and ( J) male terminalia.
